description: This file defines interfaces related to remote connections within the WPEFramework RPC namespace. It includes the declaration of the IRemoteConnection interface, along with a nested INotification interface for event notifications. The file also includes type definitions for string and value iterators, and references external headers for ID types and iterator types.

classes.name: IRemoteConnection
classes.description: Interface for remote connection management, including methods for obtaining IDs, acquiring interfaces, terminating connections, launching, and post-mortem analysis.

classes.name: IRemoteConnection::INotification
classes.description: Nested interface for handling connection state notifications such as activation, deactivation, and termination.

methods.name: IRemoteConnection::Id
methods.description: Returns the ID of the remote connection.

methods.name: IRemoteConnection::RemoteId
methods.description: Returns the remote ID associated with the connection.

methods.name: IRemoteConnection::Acquire
methods.description: Acquires an interface pointer for the connection, based on class name, interface ID, and version.

methods.name: IRemoteConnection::INotification::Activated
methods.description: Callback invoked when the connection is activated.

methods.name: IRemoteConnection::INotification::Deactivated
methods.description: Callback invoked when the connection is deactivated.

methods.name: IRemoteConnection::INotification::Terminated
methods.description: Callback invoked when the connection is terminated.

methods.name: IStringIterator
methods.description: Type definition for an iterator over strings.

methods.name: IValueIterator
methods.description: Type definition for an iterator over uint32_t values.

methods.name: REQUESTEDINTERFACE * Acquire(const uint32_t waitTime,const string & className,const uint32_t version)

ctags.name: Acquire
ctags.pattern: /^            REQUESTEDINTERFACE* Acquire(const uint32_t waitTime, const string& className, const /
ctags.signature: (const uint32_t waitTime,const string & className,const uint32_t version)

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^            struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: IRemoteConnection
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL IRemoteConnection : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
